Created a malicious XML file containing an external entity reference pointing to a file on my local system
Sent the malicious XML file to the web application
Web application processed the XML data, including the content of the external file in its response
Exploited the vulnerability to read files, execute commands, or launch Denial-of-Service (DoS) attacks
Recommended proper input validation and sanitization when processing XML data
Recommended restricting access to sensitive files on the server to prevent attackers from reading them
